name: latte
description: It's your first day in the office. Check in with Vic at reception and then head to the kitchen and get yourself off to a decent start with a nice latte.

reward.message:
Congratulations, you managed to get your latte.

Drink up, wake up and start doing a bit more to help your colleagues out.
(Or not - it's up to you.)
If you've not done so already, now might be a good time to save your achievements so far.
